description: Blake has had an eye on Kaleb for a while now, especially since he saw Kaleb bottoming for the first time on the site…Blake just had to have him! Both studs marveled at each other’s perfect bubble butts, telling one another that they like the other’s ass more than theirs…it was definitely adorable, and that led to them wanting it all, so both guys got a chance to fuck and get fucked. “It’s fun getting to do the other side for a change, especially since I have a dick and I know how to use it!” Well, Blake’s got that right! He doesn’t always get a chance to top, but he really showed Kaleb how to take dick well.
title: Blake & Kaleb: Bareback
